medical-hero.title: Medical aviation
medical-hero.description: We will take care of everything while you take care of the people important to you

medical-key-features.title: Exclusive key features
medical-key-features.description: Unlock exceptional benefits with our exclusive key features designed to enhance your travel experience:

card1.title: Find a medical aircrafts
card1.description: We will provide an aircrafts equipped with the necessary medical equipment. Please forward the requirements from the clinic and doctor to us, and we will find an aircrafts that meets your specifications.

card2.title: Provide doctors on board
card2.description: We will organise documents for the accompanying doctor or find doctors with experience in accompanying medical flights.

card3.title: Emergency flight service
card3.description: We know that sometimes time is of the essence. We have access to air ambulances around the world. Fast.

card4.title: Transplant delivery
card4.description: We are able to deliver organs from any country. Our access to a network of medical aircrafts allows us to safely deliver the transplant to the patient in a suitable environment, accompanied by a doctor.

medical-contact-us.title: Leave a request for a medical flight
